participant_1.name: Chris
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, enjoys music and the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones. I sometimes drive fast. I think I need a vacation. I sing many songs. I do not know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice.

participant_2.name: Katie
participant_2.personality: Friendly and caring, loves nature and has a passion for fashion.
participant_2.background: I like to go hiking in the woods with my brother. I am studying for my master's. I can't sing very well. I own 4 cats. I love to go shopping online for cute shoes in my size at Zappos.

content.text: Hi, I'm Chris. I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
Hello Chris, I'm Katie. I like to go hiking in the woods with my brother.
That sounds like a lot of fun, what kind of hiking do you do?
We like to go to different state parks and national forests. We recently went to the White Mountains in New Hampshire.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to New Hampshire.
It's a beautiful state. Have you ever been to any national parks?
Yes, I've been to a few. I really like the Grand Canyon.
The Grand Canyon is on my bucket list!
You should definitely go, it's amazing.
I'm definitely going to put it on my list of places to go this year.
Great! I hope you have a great time.
